StoredProcedureSqlServerv2k5.name: [sp_DBACon.rmDistContract]
StoredProcedureSqlServerv2k5.body:
@org_name varchar(10), @begin_date date.me, @end_date date.me as
declare @org_id int declare @total_count int declare @discharged_count int
set @org_id = (select organiza.on_id from recrui.ng_organiza.on where [short_name] = @org_name)
--Check to see if name was valid if @org_id is null begin Print 'Check Organiza.on Name' RETURN End
--ini.alize dates
set @end_date = dateadd(ms, -2, dateadd(day, 1, @end_date))
--Total Contracted select @total_count = (select count(*) from contract c inner join nwa n on c.nwa_id = n.nwa_id inner join candidate_status cs on n.nwa_id = cs.nwa_id inner join organiza.on_map o1 on n.organiza.on_of_record_id = o1.child_organiza.on_id inner join organiza.on_map o2 on o1.parent_organiza.on_id = o2.child_organiza.on_id --inner join organiza.on_map o3 on o2.parent_organiza.on_id = o3.child_organiza.on_id where c.contract_begin_date between @begin_date and @end_date and o2.parent_organiza.on_id = @org_id and cs.candidate_status_id = (select max(candidate_status_id) from candidate_status where nwa_id = n.nwa_id and status_e.ec.ve_date <= @end_date) and cs.disposi.on_code not in ('L') and n.comp_change_.ag is null)
--Total Discharged
select @discharged_count = (select count(*) from contract c inner join nwa n on c.nwa_id = n.nwa_id inner join candidate_status cs on n.nwa_id = cs.nwa_id inner join organiza.on_map o1 on n.organiza.on_of_record_id = o1.child_organiza.on_id inner join organiza.on_map o2 on o1.parent_organiza.on_id = o2.child_organiza.on_id --inner join organiza.on_map o3 on o2.parent_organiza.on_id = o3.child_organiza.on_id where c.discharge_date between @begin_date and @end_date and cs.candidate_status_id = (select max(candidate_status_id) from candidate_status where nwa_id = n.nwa_id and status_e.ec.ve_date <= @end_date and cs.disposi.on_code = 'L') and o2.parent_organiza.on_id = @org_id and n.comp_change_.ag is null)
print '=============================================' print 'Total Contracted ' print '=============================================' print @total_count print '=============================================' print 'Dep Discharged ' print '=============================================' print @discharged_count
